TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Researchable Tier 3 Vehicles
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, allows tier 3 vehicles research to be performed normally, while still being able to unlock them via finding and repairing the wrecks.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Craftable Tier 4 Vehicles
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, allows tier 4 vehicles to be researched and crafted just like other vehicles.
